amendment.description: To require the Coalition Provisional Authority to provide additional information justifying allocations for capital projects in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1814 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1814 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S12660) To require the Coalition Provisional Authority to provide additional information justifying allocations for capital projects in Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1814 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1814 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy.
